data: George Arlington Hemingwood, of the Air Service, didn’t care what those Kentucky mountaineers did so long as they didn’t do it to him.
GEORGE ARLINGTON HEMINGWOOD, OF THE AIR SERVICE, DIDN’T CARE WHAT THOSE KENTUCKY MOUNTAINEERS DID SO LONG AS THEY DIDN’T DO IT TO HIM.
